attributes.action: Repeal the honours of Sir Irvine Patnick
attributes.additional_details:
Sir Irvine Patnick has been exposed as one of the sources of vile lies about the behaviour of Liverpool F.C. supporters in relation to the tragedy which occurred on April 15th 1989 at Hillsborough stadium in Sheffield.

It is the opinion of myself, and many others, that this man be stripped of all awards bestowed upon him by Her Majesty's government as a result of the pain, suffering and torment which his lies, disseminated by local and national media, caused to the friends and families of the 96 men, women and children who lost their lives in this most appalling catastrophe.

Christopher J. Hand
